tool_description: Identifies potential natural water sources within a specified radius based on terrain features, topography, and environmental indicators for different landscape types.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of search center (-90 to 90 degrees)

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of search center (-180 to 180 degrees)

terrain_type.description: Primary terrain classification: forest, desert, mountain, grassland, coastal, urban

elevation_meters.description: Current elevation above sea level in meters

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Search radius out of range: Radius must be between 0.1 and 50 kilometers.
Unsupported terrain type: Use one of [forest, desert, mountain, grassland, coastal, urban].
Elevation out of reasonable range: Elevation should be between -500 and 9000 meters.
usage: Provide current coordinates, desired search radius, and terrain type. Optionally include elevation for more accurate results. Returns ranked list of potential water source locations with distance and confidence ratings.

total_sources_found.description: Number of potential water sources identified

source_locations.description: GPS coordinates of identified water sources

source_types.description: Predicted water source types for each location

distances_km.description: Distance in kilometers to each identified source

confidence_scores.description: Confidence ratings (0-1) for each source prediction
